data.name: Sunwave Hotel
data.detailed_description:
Wanna get away?

In the game, you're part of a duo who crash-landed on a tropical island. Employed by a ruthless criminal, you and your partner must get back on your feet and figure out a way to complete your original job. Along the way, you’ll solve problems and meet new friends and companions to help complete your mission.

Welcome to the Jungle - Set in a tropical paradise, you must navigate multiple islands, each teaming with opportunity and danger. Of course, it's up to you which path you will take to finish your work.



Enjoy your Rewards - Play your cards right and many of your new friends will want to blow off some steam. Enjoy 37 Erotic Scenes, all with solid hand-drawn artwork.



Get Rich or Die Trying - What's the price of your loyalty? Do you see things through, or do you find just the right time to double-cross that megacorp who thought threatening you was a good idea?



Multiple factions and characters will either help or hinder you as you continue your adventure.

data.short_description: Dive into a sexy sci-fi adventure that combines Point and Click with Dialogue Choices. After crash landing during a dangerous job, you and your partner must get back on your feet. Along the way, you'll solve problems and meet new friends to help you before your luck finally runs out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.80 GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is a piece of science-fiction and contains depictions of frequent sexual interactions between humans and a people of alien races such as space orcs, devil girls, and more.
